news.headline: Xylo Technologies' Revoltz gets approval to market PORTO EV micro vehicle in Israel after Israeli Standards Institute approval.
news.summary: Xylo Technologies Ltd., a technology company listed on Nasdaq under the symbol XYLO, shared news today about its subsidiary Revoltz Ltd receiving approval from the Israeli Standards Institute to distribute the PORTO EV micro vehicle in Israel. Charging Robotics, Inc., a Delaware corporation with a 19.9% stake in Revoltz, is listed on the OTC Market under the symbol CHEV. Furthermore, Xylo holds a majority ownership stake of 63.7% in Charging Robotics. This development marks a significant step for Revoltz in entering the Israeli market with its electric vehicle offering.

news.headline: SLB OneSubsea partners with Vår Energi for significant SPS work in Norway. Commencing work for two projects on NCS.
news.summary: In Houston, SLB (NYSE: SLB) revealed an agreement between its OneSubsea™ joint venture and Vår Energi to provide a substantial subsea production systems (SPS) work package. This deal builds upon the established strategic subsea partnership arrangement, aiming to supply standardized subsea equipment. The collaboration is geared towards backing numerous forthcoming oil and gas projects on the Norwegian Continental Shelf (NCS). The SPS pre-commitment initiative kicks off promptly, focusing on delivering two e...

news.headline: Merck beats Q4 expectations but stock drops on weaker 2025 sales guidance, impacting Dow Jones.
news.summary: Merck exceeded fourth-quarter expectations on Wall Street, however, the company may face a decline in stock value due to lower-than-anticipated sales guidance for 2025. The pharmaceutical giant's performance for Q4 was positive, but its outlook for 2025 has raised concerns among investors. This news of Merck's performance was reported by Investor's Business Daily, highlighting the discrepancy between the strong Q4 results and the cautious 2025 guidance that could impact the company's stock performance.

news.headline: Google's Q4 earnings call to address AI strategy post DeepSeek news. CEO Sundar Pichai to discuss capital spending.
news.summary: During Google's fourth-quarter earnings call, CEO Sundar Pichai is expected to discuss the company's artificial intelligence strategy following the DeepSeek news. The focus will be on Alphabet's earnings as investors keep an eye on capital spending. Analysts are wondering if Google stock will be a good buy in this scenario.

news.headline: PayPal earnings exceed Q4 estimates but stock falls. Fiscal 2025 profit guidance surpasses expectations.
news.summary: In the fourth quarter, PayPal reported earnings that exceeded expectations despite reduced projections. The fiscal 2025 profit guidance for PayPal stock also surpassed expectations. Despite this positive news, the stock is currently experiencing a decline in value.

news.headline: Global soup and broth market set to reach US$ 13.89 billion by 2034, with an estimated value of US$9.68 billion in 2024. Key drivers include health benefits, variety of tastes, and convenience. Tomatoes account for 20.1% market share in 2024. Canada's market expected to earn US$595.3 million by 2034. East Asia projects a 4.2% CAGR.
news.summary: The global soup and broth market is valued at US$9.68 billion in 2024 and expected to grow at a CAGR of 3.7% until 2034. The increasing appreciation for their tastes and health benefits is driving their consumption worldwide. These nutrient-rich foods are popular for their adaptability to various dietary needs and appeal to health-conscious consumers. The market is forecasted to reach US$13.89 billion by 2034. Key growth drivers include health advantages, taste variety, and convenience. East Asia is expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.2% by 2034, while tomatoes hold a significant 20.1% market share in 2024. Canada's market revenue is projected to reach US$595.3 million by 2034, and South Korea is expected to grow at a 4.9% CAGR. Trends indicate tomatoes, beans, and chicken as popular choices, with eco-friendly packaging solutions gaining traction.

news.headline: TGH Foundation receives $4M gift for David & Tara Ruberg HVI Innovation Center to drive research at TGH Heart & Vascular Institute.
news.summary: A significant donation has been made to the Tampa General Hospital (TGH) Foundation in Tampa, Florida to establish the David & Tara Ruberg HVI Innovation Center of Excellence within the TGH Heart & Vascular Institute. This contribution will accelerate innovative research and development initiatives. The news was announced on February 4, 2025.

news.headline: TransFueler and Superior Storage Tanks & Trailers in Calif. added 2 delivery vehicles to their fleet for local shipping ops.
news.summary: In February 4, 2025, TransFueler and its parent company, Superior Storage Tanks & Trailers, announced an expansion of operations in Southern California, including local shipping and on-site servicing. The fleet now includes two new vehicles: a 2024 Ford F-150.

news.headline: Shipley Do-Nuts adds 24 units in 2024, achieving 16th positive sales quarter in a row.
news.summary: A well-known Texas donut and kolache company has expanded by adding 24 new locations, achieving a positive sales streak for the 16th consecutive quarter. Shipley Do-Nuts, a historic and rapidly expanding brand in the donut industry, finished 2024 with remarkable success and advancement, marking new milestones.

news.headline: $INTC Chinese Regulators are now also looking at launching a formal probe into Intel - FT.
Revo expands in APAC with Revo Australia joint venture, marking its 40th anniversary milestone.
news.summary: Revo, the renowned performance eyewear brand famous for its premium polarized sunglasses, has revealed plans for expanding its global presence in honor of its 40th anniversary. The company has introduced a new joint venture, Revo Australia, aimed at further solidifying its position in the market. The venture signifies a strategic move by Revo to strengthen its foothold in the industry. The announcement was made on February 4, 2025, marking a significant step for the brand. Celebrating four successful decades, Revo is set to capitalize on this initiative to enhance its reach worldwide.

news.headline: Intesa plans €2B share repurchase after record profit.
Coinbase pushes for Crypto banking barrier removal, supports US banks in offering custody and execution for crypto assets.
news.summary: The leading custodian for US-based spot Bitcoin ETFs, Coinbase, is advocating for US state-chartered banks to have the authorization to offer and delegate crypto custody and execution services. This move could potentially increase accessibility to cryptocurrency services and further legitimize the industry within the United States. The proposal aims to streamline the process for institutions interested in venturing into the crypto market, potentially leading to a wider adoption of digital assets. Coinbase's initiative seeks to open up opportunities for state-chartered banks to engage in the growing crypto sector, as well as promoting regulatory clarity in the evolving financial landscape. This could pave the way for increased participation from traditional financial institutions in the cryptocurrency space, fostering innovation and growth in the industry.

news.headline: Pickleball Kingdom opening in Holyoke, MA at 50 Holyoke St, 44,000 sq ft facility. World's largest indoor pickleball entity.
news.summary: In February 4, 2025, in Holyoke, Massachusetts, Pickleball Kingdom, the leading indoor pickleball organization globally, revealed plans for a new facility at 50 Holyoke St, Holyoke, MA 01040. This cutting-edge venue will cover 44,000 square feet and serve as the largest of its kind.

news.headline: Construction payroll platform Trayd secured $4.5M in seed funding led by Suffolk Technologies, aiming to meet growing demand.
news.summary: A new construction payroll platform called Trayd has recently announced a successful $4.5 million equity fundraise in New York, reflecting significant early adoption and increasing demand among important customers. Suffolk Technologies, the venture capital arm of Suffolk Construction, spearheaded the seed round with backing from Bloomberg Beta and Y Combinator. The funding will primarily be utilized for product development, team growth, and scaling initiatives to keep up with market needs. Despite being a massive industry valued at approximately $2 trillion, construction faces challenges in digital transformation and efficiency.

news.headline: Aramco Digital, Armada, and Microsoft partner to deploy industrial distributed cloud in Saudi Arabia, advancing AI.
news.summary: In Dhahran, Saudi Arabia, a significant partnership has been formed by Aramco Digital, Armada, and Microsoft on February 4, 2025. The collaboration aims to introduce Galleon edge data centers, the Commander software platform, and practical AI applications in the region. This initiative represents a crucial step forward in leveraging AI-driven automation.

news.headline: Veriti launches proactive cloud remediation solution to scale exposure management for AWS, Azure, and GCP.
news.summary: Veriti, a prominent provider of exposure management solutions, has introduced a pioneering approach to addressing vulnerabilities on a large scale for AWS, Azure, and GCP cloud platforms. Leveraging infrastructure as code, APIs, and automations, Veriti can efficiently remediate exposures while ensuring business operations continue seamlessly. The company's initiative based in Tel Aviv, Israel was launched on February 4, 2025.

news.headline: CDPR reports new results from Quiulacocha Zone, show significant increase in Gallium and Lead levels in 8 drill holes.
news.summary: Montreal, 4th February 2025 - Cerro de Pasco Resources Inc. (CSE: CDPR) (OTCQB: GPPRF) (FRA: N8HP), known as CDPR, has released the assay results for eight more drill holes at the Quiulacocha Tailings Project in Central Peru.

news.headline: RadiusDC in Denver enhances data center facade with modern design, to meet connectivity demands. announced on Feb. 4, 2025.
news.summary: A recently completed data center space with cutting-edge design features and essential capacity to address the increasing demands for connectivity has been unveiled in Denver. RadiusDC, known for its network of urban data centers, has introduced this new facility to cater to the escalating need for connectivity. The modern design elements incorporated in the data center space align with the growing requirements of efficient and reliable digital services. This launch signifies RadiusDC's commitment to providing top-of-the-line infrastructure to support the escalating digital connectivity needs.

news.headline: UMeWorld introduces 4 DAGola cooking oil blends: Premium, Vitality, Gourmet & Master Chef. Elevating health, flavor for cooks.
news.summary: UMeWorld has recently introduced four new premium blends to its DAGola cooking oil line, catering to both home cooks and chefs. The new blends, including Premium, Vitality, Gourmet, and Master Chef, offer a healthier and more flavorful alternative for cooking. With this expansion, UMeWorld now provides a total of 6 different options within the DAGola cooking oil line, showcasing its commitment to offering quality products for culinary enthusiasts.

news.headline: Axtria's GenAI technology speeds up clinical study reports by 30-50%, with 90% accuracy, and cost savings.
news.summary: A cutting-edge GenAI-powered solution has revolutionized the production of clinical study reports, offering incredible results to users. The innovative technology boasts an impressive 30%–50% faster turnaround time compared to traditional methods. Additionally, it guarantees a remarkable 90% accuracy aligned with ICH-E3 standards, highlighting its reliability and precision. This groundbreaking solution has also resulted in significant cost savings for organizations. The technology was introduced by Axtria Inc., a prominent global cloud software and data analytics company based in BERKELEY HEIGHTS, N.J. The impact of this advancement is poised to streamline processes and enhance efficiencies in the field of clinical research.

news.headline: Worksport Ltd. introduces flagship AL4 product line, starts shipping amid positive feedback, plans production increase. ($WKSP)
news.summary: The recent report indicated a significant increase in the number of COVID-19 cases in the country. Over the past week, there were 10,000 new confirmed cases, bringing the total number of infections to 75,000. The number of deaths also rose by 500 in the same period, with the total now reaching 2,000. This surge in cases has put pressure on the healthcare system, leading to around 80% of hospital beds being occupied. Authorities are advising the public to adhere to safety guidelines to curb the spread of the virus.

news.headline: Straine Dental Management and Dr. Scott Jolly acquire new Benton, Arkansas practice - expansion in dental services organization.
news.summary: In Sacramento, California on February 4, 2025, Straine Dental Management (SDM), a prominent dentist-owned and dentist-led dental services organization (DSO), has revealed a significant update. They have collaborated with Scott Jolly, DDS, a well-known dentist from Arkansas, to acquire a new dental facility.

news.headline: Global supply chain disruptions cost $184 billion/year, with 76% experiencing issues, per survey of 2,000 European shipping customers.
news.summary: In Jericho, New York, a report indicates that supply chain disruptions are causing organizations to lose about $184 billion every year, as stated by Swiss Re. A survey conducted by logistics company Maersk among 2,000 European shipping customers found that 76% of them had encountered supply chain disruptions.

news.headline: Checkers & Rally's partner with John Soules Foods to offer popular Chicken Bites in freezer aisle. Tampa, Feb. 4, 2025.
news.summary: Checkers & Rally's, a popular drive-thru restaurant chain recognized for its bold and irresistible flavors, has partnered with John Soules Foods to bring their signature taste to customers' homes. Based in Tampa, Florida, this collaboration brings the iconic offerings of Checkers & Rally's to a wider audience, providing the same craveable experience that fans have come to love. This partnership, established on February 4, 2025, marks a significant milestone for both companies as they aim to deliver delicious meals at a great value, accessible to more people. With this collaboration, fans can now savor the distinctive flavors of Checkers & Rally's beyond the drive-thru, offering a new way to enjoy their favorite dishes.

news.headline: Itaú Unibanco to present 4Q24 results on Feb 6, 2025, in Portuguese and English. Q&A session included. Register to join.
news.summary: The 4th quarter results for the year 2024 will be presented on February 6, 2025, at 8 a.m. EST and 10 a.m. Brasília time. The presentation will be conducted in both Portuguese and English, featuring an interactive session and a Q&A segment. To participate in this meeting, interested individuals can register before the event at the specified time slots.

news.headline: Happy Money appoints Gaurav Agarwal as Chief Credit Officer to bolster risk analytics; aims for growth.
news.summary: An experienced credit and risk executive has been appointed to lead the credit strategy and support substantial growth for the leading consumer finance company based in TORRANCE, Calif. The executive's role is aimed at boosting the company's operations and drive substantial expansion. Happy Money, recognized as a top consumer finance firm committed to providing responsible lending services, will benefit from the executive's expertise. This move signifies the company's dedication to enhancing its credit operations and achieving meaningful growth.

news.headline: Greenwave Technology Solutions, Inc. expects revenue of $47-$50 million for FY 2025, driven by metal tariffs, with 40-45% gross profit margins.
news.summary: The implementation of tariffs is anticipated to result in a notable 10-20% increase in revenue for metal products, which currently maintain high gross profit margins between 40-45%. Greenwave, a supplier of steel, aluminum, copper, and rare-earth metals, exclusively sources its materials domestically. The company is engaged in discussions with various parties interested in obtaining its products.

news.headline: 8.3 form filed for International Paper Company.
Walgreens celebrates one-year anniversary of Deans Advisory Council focusing on pharmacy industry challenges.
news.summary: Walgreens, based in Deerfield, Illinois, reflects on significant progress achieved since the establishment of the Walgreens Deans Advisory Council a year ago. The council was created to improve the pharmacy profession by finding ways to draw in, recruit, and foster a vibrant environment for current and prospective pharmacists. The collaboration with 17 deans from pharmacy schools has shown great success in achieving these objectives. Their efforts are focused on developing the talent within the field.

news.headline: Buyer's agent average commission for Q4 was 2.37%, slightly down from previous year's 2.45% due to NAR settlement impact.
news.summary: In Seattle, the average buyer's agent commission for homes sold in the fourth quarter was reported at 2.37%, as stated in a recent report by Redfin. This figure remained relatively stable compared to the previous quarter's 2.36%, around the time when new National Association of Realtors (NAR) commission regulations were implemented. However, it showed a slight decrease from the 2.45% recorded a year prior to the announcement of these new rules. These insights were gathered through an analysis conducted by the technology-driven real estate brokerage.

news.headline: Filter King LLC expands to Nevada, opens manufacturing center in Las Vegas, becoming largest pleated filter manufacturer. Enhances rapid supply to Southwest and West Coast markets, including California.
news.summary: Filter King LLC, the country's foremost custom pleated filter manufacturer focusing on superior HVAC and furnace filters, revealed the launch of its latest manufacturing and distribution center in Las Vegas, Nevada. As the largest in the nation, the facility boasts production, warehousing, and distribution amenities to improve efficiency in supplying air filters throughout the Southwest and West Coast, particularly in prominent markets like California. This move signifies Filter King's commitment to meeting increasing demand for their high-quality products in the region, further solidifying their position as a leader in the industry.

news.headline: VICI Properties Inc. replaces $2.5 billion credit facility with strong support from 15 financial institutions.
news.summary: VICI Properties Inc. disclosed the launch of its $2.5 billion multicurrency unsecured revolving credit facility, replacing the previous facility of equal value. The new facility, which effectively replaced the old one, garnered substantial interest from 15 financial institutions, resulting in oversubscription. The Revolving Credit Facility, set to mature on [date], saw strong participation from lenders, indicating their confidence in VICI Properties.

news.headline: BGSF, Inc. predicts property management trends for 2025, highlighting growth in renting and multi-family developments amidst high interest rates and housing affordability issues. CEO emphasizes research to address industry needs.
news.summary: In Plano, Texas, BGSF, Inc. (NYSE: BGSF), a leading provider of consulting and workforce solutions, has shared fresh insights regarding its Property Management division. Beth Garvey, the Chair, President, and CEO, highlighted the company's focus on rental and multi-family projects amid shifting generational demands. Looking ahead to 2025, with rising interest rates and housing affordability challenges, the sector is poised for growth. BGSF's thorough research positions them to anticipate and address future needs effectively.

news.headline: Sirius Medical secures 10M€ in scale-up funding to expand global presence, led by Invest-NL and Nextgen. #WorldCancerDay.
news.summary: In Eindhoven, Netherlands on February 4, 2025, Sirius Medical, a Dutch medical device company specializing in surgical marker navigation, revealed on World Cancer Day that it had obtained an extra 10 million euros in scale-up funding. The funding came from a round led by Invest-NL and Nextgen, marking a significant step forward for the company.

news.headline: Cambodia Microfinance Association partners with NBC and UN to improve lending practices to address microfinance sector issues.
news.summary: In Phnom Penh, Cambodia, as of February 4, 2025, the National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) and the United Nations (UN) have been spearheading a major initiative to tackle critical issues in the country's microfinance industry. The consultation, initiated since 2024, aims to combat prevalent problems such as over-indebtedness and financial risks associated with land ownership. This collaboration seeks to address these challenges by implementing strategic measures to bring stability and sustainability to the microfinance sector in Cambodia.

news.headline: Payflo partners with MoneyGram for cash payment solutions in U.S. gaming and lottery industries. (Characters: 85)
news.summary: On February 4, 2025, Payflo Inc., a top provider of payment services for heavily regulated sectors, revealed a collaboration with MoneyGram. This partnership aims to provide specialized cash-in and cash-out payment options for the gaming, lottery, and marker settlement sectors in the United States. The move signifies a significant step...

news.headline: HYDRINITY Accelerated Skin Science named fastest-growing skincare brand with a remarkable 226% growth year-over-year.
news.summary: A skincare company, HYDRINITY Accelerated Skin Science, based in Nashville, Tennessee, has experienced impressive growth, reaching a remarkable 226% increase year-over-year. This achievement solidifies HYDRINITY's position as the fastest-growing professional skincare brand in the United States. This news was announced on February 4, 2025, showcasing the company's success in the competitive skincare market.

news.headline: GridGain introduces GridGain for AI to enhance real-time data processing & analytics for faster & more scalable AI predictions.
news.summary: GridGain, a California-based company, has introduced GridGain for AI on February 4, 2025. This platform enhances predictive AI and generative AI applications, making them faster and more scalable. GridGain is known for its real-time data processing and analytics solutions. With this new offering, organizations can expect improved performance in AI use cases, thanks to enhanced capabilities for processing and analyzing data.

news.headline: Advantage Capital invests in The Harbor at Quantico Creek, bringing 125 affordable housing units to Virginia.
news.summary: In St. Louis, Advantage Capital has announced its investment in The Harbor at Quantico Creek development project, which aims to provide 125 units of affordable housing in Virginia.

news.headline: IO Biotech reveals preclinical results on IO112, targeting Arginase 1 in cancer treatment. #research #vaccine #cancer
news.summary: In a recent report, it was stated that the unemployment rate in the country has reached an all-time high of 9.2%, with over 14 million people currently out of work. Additionally, the report highlighted a 5.6% decrease in GDP for the previous fiscal quarter, marking the largest drop in economic output in over a decade. Experts predict that these economic challenges will likely persist in the coming months, prompting concerns about the long-term impact on the country's economy. The government has announced plans to implement various stimulus measures to address the situation and support those affected by the economic downturn.

news.headline: Rackspace and Munster Technological University launch Ireland's 1st Quantum Cloud Platform on AWS, driving 11 research projects.
news.summary: 13 research institutes in Ireland have been linked by QCloud to support 11 significant quantum computing projects. This initiative aims to revolutionize the country's quantum research sector.

news.headline: Restaurants facing egg shortages with no relief in sight, per Bloomberg - shortage impacting supply.

Global oligonucleotide CDMO market to reach $6.73 billion by 2029 with 21.8% CAGR. Contract manufacturing segment expected to dominate fueled by the need for large-scale cGMP-compliant production. Therapeutic applications segment led the market in 2023 due to rise in drug approvals for genetic disorders, oncology, and rare diseases.
news.summary: The global Oligonucleotide CDMO Market was valued at US$2.33 billion in 2023 and is expected to grow at a CAGR of 21.8%. It reached US$2.51 billion in 2024 and is forecasted to reach US$6.73 billion by 2029. Factors driving this growth include increased outsourcing to CDMOs and a focus on precision/personalized medicine. Contract manufacturing dominates the market, especially in the commercial segment due to FDA-approved oligonucleotide-based therapeutics. The market is segmented based on service types and applications, with therapeutic applications leading the market in 2023. Key market players offer advanced synthesis and purification technologies to meet the growing demand for oligonucleotide therapeutics.

news.headline: Collective Voice appoints Catherine Halaby as VP of Creator Relations, enhancing creator empowerment with TikTok executive hire.
Private Health Management released a whitepaper showing 2 to 4 times longer cancer survival rates across six advanced cancer types.
news.summary: According to recent data, patients with six advanced cancer types have been experiencing significantly improved survival rates, lasting 2 to 4 times longer. Private Health Management (PHM), a renowned provider of precision medicine and specialized care for severe medical conditions, revealed this information on February 4, 2025, in Los Angeles. This development showcases a substantial advancement in the treatment outcomes for individuals battling complex cancer types.

news.headline: Mobix Labs wins U.S. defense grant for satellite tech; RaGE gets Phase 1 STTR contract with UML.
news.summary: Mobix Labs Inc., a prominent company in Wireless system and semiconductor solutions listed on Nasdaq under MOBX, has disclosed the acquisition of RaGE Systems Inc. (CAGE:863W3). The acquired company has secured a Phase 1 Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) contract granted by the U.S. Department of Defense’s Defense Microelectronics Activity (DMEA). This contract, part of multiple awards by DMEA, entails funding for a collaborative Phase 1 project with the University of Massachusetts at Lowell (UML).

news.headline: Regulus Therapeutics (Nasdaq: RGLS) to present at Oppenheimer's 35th Annual Healthcare Life Sciences Conference in San Diego.
news.summary: On February 4, 2025, in San Diego, Regulus Therapeutics Inc. (Nasdaq: RGLS), a biopharmaceutical firm specializing in creating groundbreaking medications that target microRNAs, disclosed that executives from the organization will...

news.headline: SM Energy (NYSE: SM) to release Q4, 2024 financial results and 2025 operating plan on Feb 19, 2025. Live Q&A call scheduled.
news.summary: SM Energy Company, a publicly traded entity under the ticker symbol SM, has disclosed its intention to reveal its financial and operational outcomes for the fourth quarter and entire fiscal year of 2024, in addition to its operational strategy for 2025. The report is scheduled to be released post-market close on February 19, 2025. This move is expected to provide stakeholders and investors with a comprehensive overview of the company's performance over the past year and its projected direction moving forward.

news.headline: Kahoot! releases Kahoot! Energize to elevate meetings with interactive experiences. From Austin, Texas on Feb. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire.
news.summary: Kahoot!, a global learning and engagement company based in Austin, Texas, has introduced Kahoot! Energize to enhance workplace presentations and create interactive experiences for audiences. This new offering aims to increase audience engagement and improve business performance. The launch took place on February 4, 2025, with the goal of transforming traditional presentations into dynamic two-way interactions. Kahoot! Energize provides a platform for businesses to enliven their presentations and drive better results.
